title: Ultimate Teacher - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Harem   Martial Arts   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
author: Liu Xia Hui   柳下挥
description: Fang Yan is a Tai Chi Clan descendant, but because of a barbaric woman’s intolerable bullying, he escaped from the Clan and abandoned his Martial background to become a language teacher at a Private High School. Thus, the ultimate teacher was born!>
